dct_title_s: Emei shan lü you tu = Tourist map of Mt. Emei.
dct_description_sm: Bird's-eye view and pictorial. Tourist information, tables, and ancillary map of places of interest near Mt. Emei on verso. "Published by Peace Book Co., Ltd, H.K., Sichuan People's Publishing House"
dct_creator_sm: Sichuan ren min chu ban she
dct_publisher_sm: Hong Kong : Sizhuan ren min chu ban she, 1986.
Hong Kong : L. Rex Offset Printing Co., Ltd, 1986.
